name: Mate in One
description:
Early test build of Mate in One. Would love feedback on difficulty (if you have a chess rating that would be helpful to know as well), what I can do to make it more fun, bugs, and anything else. You can contact me on twitter @SebastianLague, or by email seblague@yahoo.com

Known issues:

  • audio doesn't work in web build
  • options screen doesn't work
